channel.title: Portforwarded Correctly, Yet still no connection?
channel.description:
Hey,
I've recently just tried to upload my own server so i can play with close friends online. I've portforwarded, made a no-ip and what not. I've checked that my port is open using software that i've previously used (when i last put a server online). I've checked using the Runelocus server status checker and it does actually say that my server is ONLINE and PLAYABLE on port 43594. However, nobody seems to be able to connect?
I know it must be very frustrating having to help people like me, yet i've tried for hours on end, searched a lot of forum posts and have still no idea what the problem may be! if anyone could help i'd be very thankful.
You can also contact me on skype if makes life easier for you, simply PM me for my address.
Thanks a lot!

item.title: Portforwarded Correctly, Yet still no connection?
item.dc:creator: @NathanRunescape NathanRunescape
item.description:
@NathanRunescape wrote:

Thanks for your replies guys, i’ve fixed it now. Don’t know what i did but i must of changed something that i should of left alone.

Started it from scratch again and now it’s online! Once again, thanks a lot for your replies

Read full topic
item.source: Portforwarded Correctly, Yet still no connection?

item.title: Portforwarded Correctly, Yet still no connection?

item.description:
@chazion wrote:

Did you change the port client sided? Also some severs require a specific client to connect

item.title: Portforwarded Correctly, Yet still no connection?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

http://www.yougetsignal.com/tools/open-ports/

Try that.

Is there any errors that appear in the server console?
